alert.note: Alert for Ravalli (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 11 at 9:36PM MDT until further notice by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Missoula MT has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Montana... Bitterroot River At Bell Crossing Near Victor affecting Ravalli County. .A combination of excessive rainfall and snowmelt will cause the Bitterroot River at Bell Crossing to reach minor flood stage tonight. For the Bitterroot River...including At Bell Crossing Near Victor... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bitterroot River Near At Bell Crossing Near Victor. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Minor flooding to low lying areas adjacent to the river from Hamilton to Florence may occur. At 11.5 feet, County roads may experience flooding from Hamilton to Florence. At 12.0 feet, County roads will experience flooding from Hamilton to Florence. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM MDT Saturday the stage was 11.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 PM MDT Saturday was 11.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise tonight through Tuesday. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning to 10.1 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday evening at 600 PM MDT.
